channel.title: Hosting
channel.description:
First of all, I am not requesting a hoster.
I am willing to let someone use my computer and fast internet ( with Bad-Ass Router) To host your RSPS. I will even code some things in I feel needed. (Will let people help and what not)
Here is the specs of what i have, First off, my router.. [img]http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/electronics/detail-page/B003B48UQ8.hero-400.jpg[/img]
This is a link to the specifications and what all the router has [url=http://reviews.cnet.com/routers/cisco-linksys-e3000/4505-3319_7-34041744.html]http://reviews.cnet.com/routers/cisco-linksys-e3000/4505-3319_7-34041744.html[/url] --------------------------------------------------------------------- Here is the specs of my computer.. [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5yut5u.png[/img]
Also, I am not really sure how to host that well so someone will have to help me with getting things going, and after things are going, i can keep the server up as much as I can, will have very few down times.
Also, Why not just get a VPS? Well I can assure you that I have very fast intertnet.
[img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1982966172.png[/img]
So if you feel that I can host your server, feel free to post a response and lets see what we can do.

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @soul_raever soul raever
item.description:
@soul_raever wrote:

Butchd12:

D12 being one of Eminem’s previous works

D12 was his band… not one of his works so it may well pay for you to at least have some knowledge on your idols if you will.

As for the hosting you upload speed sucks, well so does your download but upload is more important (to an extent) when it comes to hosting a server of any kind
if you look at the bottom of your speed test result you will notice it’s worse than 70% or the US and well that’s a fair bit

As for your employment and age it really does not matter what you say people just wont believe you and they have no reason to (this is the internet where anyone can hide behind a lie) but given you lack some spelling knowledge and grammar even when trying so hard to make yourself sound intelligent this will just poke more holes in any façade you have, you may well point out grammatical errors in my post or spelling however I’m not trying to make anyone believe whom I am.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

[quote=“kronixz, post:11, topic:443624”][quote author=Butchd12 link=topic=546305.msg4005048#msg4005048 date=1338517939]
You edited you comment and put computer instead of VPS, so yeah… dont try and make yourself look better. just jealous that your poor family can only afford a computer with 1 GIG ram?
[/quote]
lol now its about being poor? lol… butchd"12", im assuming your 12 years old whos spoiled who gets there computer for free. nigga, i payed for this computa. now gtfo of these forums.[/quote]

Nope, my name came from 2 different things, butch being a butcher… and D12 being one of Eminem’s previous works, And im 18, I have a job, and ive never been spoiled, all my life i grew up poor, so i had to work for everything i have, right now im making 25 dollors a hour doing construction. So next time you try to diss someone, get your facts straight so you dont make yourself sound like a inmature little twit.

Read full topic

that is horrible speed for a server.

you do realise i could host without lag about 100 people…
[/quote]
omg 100 people? omfg i should get near reality t0 hire me?!?![/quote]

being that soulsplit has the most active community, being players that play the game… and they have a very powerful VPS, and I have no VPS, and there is 1469 players on there server atm, so since i have no VPS and i can hold ATLEAST 100 players with no lag, means that i must be doing something right… or are you just jelly and gonna troll me? I think its the troll part… hmm…
